name: Loop Dungeon (VladGG Dev)
description:
Hold on, is this dungeon looping?

You enter the mysterious randomly generated dungeon in hopes to get rich. Suddenly, you realize that you can't find the exit anymore and turning back only generates new passageways.

Controls
  • WASD or arrow keys to move;
  • Bump into enemies to kill them and into chests to destroy them
  • Click on the potion icons to drink them
  • M to control the sound volume
